dayInfo.title: Kalama Conservancy - Surreal Scenes in the Sky
dayInfo.description: An immaculate glamping-style suite awaits your arrival at the phenomenal Kalama Conservancy, a private reserve sharing the purity of the African landscape from your chic, secluded accommodation. Upon arrival, you may join an experienced ranger for a behind-the-scenes wildlife tour to breathtaking game viewing spots sprinkling the untamed landscape. In the afternoon, you may gaze upon the stars twinkling in the night sky without the interruption of light pollution common to populated places. With exceptional stargazing equipment available, you will be able to see the furthest stars and planets floating around our universe.

dayInfo.title: Kalama Conservancy - Astonishing Adventures across Kalama
dayInfo.description: How you spend your days in Kalama is entirely up to you, spoiled for choice with several significant activities showcasing the beauty of the reserve. From photographic safaris in hides concealing you from the curious creatures to sacred mountain treks along the pathways zigzagging up Mount Ololokwe and birdwatching at beautiful sanctuaries to private helicopter adventures above the sprawling savannas, you will discover the majesty of Kalama Conservancy during your nights spent at your glamorous getaway. In the afternoon, you may also cherish the iconic rock paintings veiling the walls of dimly lit caves.

dayInfo.title: Lewa Conservancy - Wandering through Ngare Ndare Forest
dayInfo.description: A morning safari will show off the wonders of Lewa at dawn as the sun rises above the horizon and the early hunters return to the shade of acacia trees. The chances of spotting the rare Grevy zebra and threatened rhinos are greater in the Lewa Conservancy as its wildlife is heavily protected. In the afternoon, you will head for Ngare Ndare forest to enjoy time spent beneath the shade of the greenery. Home to azure waterfalls flowing into crystal clear pools, aerial bridges spanning the emerald canopy, and lofty viewpoints sharing incredible scenes, Ngare Ndare will blow you away.

dayInfo.title: Lewa Conservancy - Exploring Lewa Conservancyâs Eco-Conscious Culture

dayInfo.title: Masai Mara - Masai Maraâs Natural Wonder of the World
dayInfo.description: The Masai Mara National Reserve is arguably Kenyaâs premier wildlife sanctuary, a staggering untouched natural park comprising sprawling emerald pastures, rugged rocky outcrops, and dense viridian forests. Furthermore, Masai Mara is home to the worldâs ultimate wildlife spectacle, the Great Migration. Should you travel to Masai Mara during the appropriate time of year, you will have the fortune of witnessing this impressive natural display in which millions of wildebeest, gazelle, zebra, and other creatures sprint across the Serengeti towards the greener plains of Kenya while many predators seek kills during the chaos.

dayInfo.title: Masai Mara - Discovering Masai Mara by Day and Night

From encountering powerful big cats, such as lions and leopards, hunting under cover of the night before dawn to witnessing massive hippos wallowing in the refreshing rivers, spectacular game sightings are abundant across Masai Mara.

dayInfo.title: Masai Mara - The Heart of Maasai
dayInfo.description: Masai Mara National Reserve is a conservation park protecting the indigenous wildlife and securing the livelihoods of the local Maasai people. Today, you will transfer to an authentic tribal village in the wild, where you will be welcomed by the friendly Maasai villagers and shown around their unique homes. From discovering delicacies native to their cultural heritage to watching traditional performances sharing insight into their distinct customs, your peek behind the scenes of Kenyan heritage will be a one-of-a-kind experience.

dayInfo.title: Masai Mara - Magnificent Memories of Masai Mara
dayInfo.description: You will embrace the sunrise over Masai Mara from the terrace of your royal campsite suite, an iconic African image of the fiery orange sun flooding the sky and creating silhouettes of giraffe and wildebeest grazing the plains. Your surroundings will come to life as you savor a scrumptious breakfast spread, and your morning soundtrack will be composed of symphonies of birdsong and faint cackles of wild dogs. These moments of serenity amongst the wilderness will make marvelous memories of your magnificent African adventures for years to come.
